comments: The Logout API is intended to be used to remove the refresh token and access token cookies if they exist on the

params.name: global
comments: When this value is set to true all of the refresh tokens issued to the owner of the

params.name: refreshToken
comments: (Optional) The refresh_token as a request parameter instead of coming in via a cookie.
If provided this takes precedence over the cookie.
